Topic.Title: Is there a way to track quest completion?

Posts.EditableText: I'm thinking of using a text adventure as part of a larger, ARG-style puzzle. Is there any way to generate a code or track that a player has beaten a game? They could even just enter their "name" in a form at the end. Anything.
Posts.HTML: I'm thinking of using a text adventure as part of a larger, ARG-style puzzle. Is there any way to generate a code or track that a player has beaten a game? They could even just enter their "name" in a form at the end. Anything.

Posts.EditableText: If the player has an online connection, you could use SetExternalFileData(phpscript, string) to call a custom PHP script and write the name or an ID to a file on your own server.
Posts.HTML: If the player has an online connection, you could use SetExternalFileData(phpscript, string) to call a custom PHP script and write the name or an ID to a file on your own server.
